data.name: FitnessVR
data.detailed_description:
FitnessVR is the first game in Virtual Reality to offer a unique sporting experience!

Choose your coach, intensity of your training and duration then start your rhythm training on the music.
Sessions can last from 5 to 45 minutes to suit all types of workouts, from beginners , to the more experienced .
You will be able to burn up to 250 calories in one session.
You can do these exercises without equipment or with bracelets of strength , to intensify the muscular effort.

You will perform ground exercises and upright , to work the muscles of the abdominals, thighs and glutes.
The exercises selected by your coach are simple and do not require special knowledge of fitness.

The activities are accessible to everyone , including seniors , and everyone goes at their own pace !

data.short_description: Fitness VR is the ideal solution for mixing video games and sustained physical activities. Enter the Fitness VR Club as you go to the gym, and sweat your muscles to wake them up and strengthen them!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64bits
  • Processor: intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
